alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 8:45PM MST until March 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Occasional snow showers. Additional snow accumulations of up to three inches. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Williams, Munds Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Visibility and road conditions can change rapidly over short distances, slow down on snow covered roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional snow forecast from 8 PM Today to 5 AM Sunday: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 1 to 2 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
